title: Lag while playing Legend of the Poro King
body: Legend of the Poro King is live right now and for some reason every time I play I experience a serious amount of lag. Other modes are completely fine. I remember this happening the last time Ascension was live, too. My computer runs every possible game/program fine and my internet is spectacular. But, for some reason this is happening. Thoughts?

replies.body: You might be having that bit of lag from all of the action going on at the same time on the poro king map. Let's double check that your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and setup in the best way for League to get access to our servers.

Im having the same problem, even when theres nothing happening in game. No king spawned, both teams aced and still lag so bad. Goes from 90-80 fps to 20-15 fps. I cant tell if its from my end because everything else works perfectly fine.

P.S. - Could it be the map? I've consistently had less fps on Howling abyss than Summoners Rift for some reason. the only thing i could think of is the background of the map being more intensive to load.

It's possible your pc is having troubles running SR specifically. Try running a repair through the client options, and double check for some driver updates as well as the rest of the steps in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) too!
